rule.control: The <RptgPrd>.<FrDt> must be in the form YYYY-MM-01.
rule.error_message: The Reporting From date is not valid.

rule.control: The <RptgPrd>.<ToDt> must be in the form YYYY-MM-DD, where DD must be the last calendar day of the MM month.
rule.error_message: The Reporting To date is not valid.

rule.control: The <RptgPrd>.<ToDt> must be the last calendar day of the month that the report concenrs
rule.error_message: The Reporting To date is not valid.

rule.control: The <SctiesSttlmSys>.<SysId> must be identical to the 0.4 corresponding SSS ID contained in the filename of the report, as stored in the CSDR7 system.
rule.error_message: The SSS ID provided in the header is not the same as the one provided in the filename.
